data.title: Esther Rolle Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Esther Rolle on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Esther Rolle including Driving Miss Daisy, My Fellow Americans, and more.
data.text:
Amazing Grace, Part 1

Tess revisits the Greenes. She tells them God says Josh needs to go with Tess. Josh has to help Monica see, since she is temporarily blinded. They travel to a city filled with tension.

Amazing Grace, Part 2

Tess revisits the Greenes. She tells them God says Josh needs to go with Tess. Josh has to help Monica see, since she is temporarily blinded. They travel to a city filled with tension.

Behind the Wheel

Esther Rolle guest stars as the troubled owner of an endangered taxicab company who hires David Banner as a driver in the hope that he can help her fight a dope-smuggling operation. When the Hulk emerges and McGee gets on the trail, Banner has to do some fancy driving to help the owner and keep his identity a secret.
